titles.title: Stop Sanctions Violators Act
To prohibit the modification of civil penalties under export control and sanctions laws of the United States with respect to Chinese telecommunication companies.
Stop Sanctions Violators Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

term.name: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

bill.summary:
Stop Sanctions Violators Act
This bill prohibits the President from modifying civil penalties as applied to a Chinese telecommunications firm for violations of export controls or sanctions laws unless certain requirements are met.
